Gyan Lakhwani
Writing

Hey, I'm Gyan.

Hi! My name is Gyan. I like technology, design and cats.

I currently work on Voice Experiences at Microsoft. In the past, I studied Interaction Design at IDC School of Design, and worked with startups on creating cool apps.

These are some thoughts.

The Left Hand of Darkness

The Left Hand of Darkness felt unlike anything I've ever read. The plot is quite simple, and yet this is one of those books where the plot barely matters. 5 Stars See Library for more things I liked reading.

Numeronyms
